PHRASE.LANG: Ce type de Chimères est moins courant que l'infanterie de base. Ces tireurs d'élite n'ont presque pas d'armure et choisissent souvent des positions leur donnant un avantage au tir. [#Legal]

This type of Chimera is a lot less common than standard infantry. They wear very little to no armor and act as sharpshooters and are commonly seen in positions that give them advantages in shooting. [#Legal]
